Title: You’re a tragedy connoisseur, Nwabufo slams Obi over Saint Lucia comments
Summary: President Tinubu’s Senior Special Assistant on Public Engagement, Fredrick Nwabufo, has knocked Labour Party Presidential Candidate, Peter Obi, for his comments on the President's visit to Saint Lucia .

Title: WIME Award to host webinar on exceptional women
Summary: Women in Maritime and Energy (WIME) Awards will on Monday June 30, 2025 host a high-impact global webinar to celebrate exceptional women .

Title: Lagos socialite sues IGP, others for harassment, demands ₦50m damages
Summary: Lagos socialite, Gail Fajembola, has filed a fundamental rights enforcement suit before the Federal High Court in Lagos, seeking an order of perpetual injunction to restrain Olutoy Estate Development & Services Ltd, the Inspector General of Police (IGP), and four others .

Title: Why President Tinubu is on state visit to Saint Lucia
Summary: Nigerian President Bola Tinubu is on state visit to Saint Lucia . The Government of Saint Lucia explains the purpose of the visit to the island nation . The visit was prompted by Nigerians' misguided, mischievous and uninformed comments .

Title: Anglican bishop urges judiciary to uphold role as final interpreter of law
Summary: Anglican bishop urges judiciary to uphold role as final interpreter of law . Bishop of the Anglican Diocese of Enugu, Rev. Samuel Ike, has called on the Chief Justice of Nigeria to rise and position .

Title: SDP acting national chairman mourns business mogul, Aminu Dantata
Summary: Acting National Chairman of the Social Democratic Party, Prof. Sadiq Umar Abubakar, has expressed deep sorrow over the passing of business mogul and philanthropist, Alhaji Aminu Dantata, who died at the age of 94 .

Title: Nasarawa Mining Dispute Deepens: Capital apex appeals to Tinubu, NSA, IGP for intervention
Summary: Capital Apex Synergy Global Services has called on President Bola Tinubu, National Security Adviser Mallam Nuhu Ribadu, Inspector General of Police Kayode Egbetu, Minister of Solid Minerals Development Dr. Dele Alake to intervene . Title: 10 passports with highest visa-free travels in 2025
Summary: Henley Passport Index 2025 reveals the latest global standings in passport strength based on visa-free travel access . The Henley Index 2025 has been released .

Title: Research Institute produces Africa’s first Zinc-Biofortified rice seeds
Summary: National Cereals Research Institute produces Africa’s first early generation zinc-biofortified rice seeds . FARO 71 and FARO 72, and officially handing them over to HarvestPlus .

Title: Ogun govt, NOA collaborate to curb illegal land acquisition
Summary: Bureau of Lands and Survey has revealed plans to collaborate with the state chapter of the National Orientation Agency (NOA) The Bureau of Land Survey and NOA will collaborate to curb illegal land acquisition in Ogun State .

Title: Police arrest two for stealing church generator battery in Adamawa
Summary: Adamawa State Police Command arrested two suspects, 20-year-old Dad Yusuf, and, 7, for stealing 100Ah Mikano generator battery in the church . The police said that the suspects were arrested on June 28, 2025, and they confessed to stealing the battery .

Title: Court jails aviation ministry worker one-year for job scam
Summary: Elvis Okerenyi, a staff member of the Federal Ministry of Aviation, has been sentenced to one year imprisonment by an Abuja High Court for defrauding a job seeker under the guise of offering him employment in the Federal Civil Service . Title: Tinubu's visit to Saint Lucia strategic engagement, not vacation - Presidency
Summary: President Bola Tinubu's state visit to Saint Lucia is rekindling Nigeria’s ancestral and strategic ties with the Caribbean nation and the wider CARICOM bloc . Title: Fast-track development in South-West, Oyebanji urges new SWDC chair
Summary: Ekiti State Governor, Biodun Oyebanji, has urged the newly appointed Chairman of the South West Development Commission, Senator Olubunmi Adetunmbi, to fast-track development across the South-West geo-political zone . Title: Speaker Abbas pledges N100m start-up capital for Zaria vocational graduates
Summary: Tajudeen Abbas promised to provide N100m start-up capital to graduates of a vocational and skill acquisition centre in Zaria Federal Constituency .
